basic.description:
A presentation of the principles of textual production in French as applied in the production of various types of texts.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Rédaction et style I

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     FREN250 or FREN221 or (FREN212 and FREN220).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN330; FREN201; FREN202.
